title: 00 Schneider - Im Wendekreis der Eidechse (2013)
description: Commissioner Schneider is back. Nineteen years after "00 Schneider - Jagd auf Nihil Baxter" the aging policeman now has to face the villain Jean-Claude Pillemann (aka the lizard man). A tobacco shop is robbed and a chicken disappears, resulting in a lot of work for the grumpy policeman. An in addition Schneider's aunt from America is staying for a visit... Written by Moritz Muehlenhoff <jmm@inutil.org>
characterList: Kommissar Roy Schneider / Zahnarzt Dr. Ferklefuss / Professor Walther Henry / Klavier
